channel.title: The return of an older-style world?
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?14,15,503,64217453
Do you think they'll return a world from the old-days? I highly doubt it tbh.

item.source: The return of an older-style world?

item.title: The return of an older-style world?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

The thing about 2006 style servers is, no matter how many of you guys are like “omg I want 06scape so cul I’m actually 9 never played 2006 I’m lying hurr” is that you’ll get bored after a while, oh sure Jagex will make money to start off, but you’ll all start to miss your elysians and your torva. Secondly you’ll also realise that with no new content the game will get boring as hell, and RuneScape didn’t have the best content back in 2006. What good bosses, minigames, new quests. Thirdly, you’ll find out hard it was to train back in 2006, and I’m sure you’ll get bored of it.

Its all nostalgia, you’ll lose it after a while so I don’t know why you guys are so needy.

However, if its let’s say a server straight before EoC, or let’s say 2011-2012, they can just forget about the EoC and continoue to add more content onto the game, but the thing is IF you give the EoC a chance you’ll realise its pretty good, now its not the same old boss everytime because you basically put a protect mage/range/melee and you’re invinsible, you actually have to pay
attention to train and you don’t have the same old click and gain xp content. The game needs to progress, and before you whine about solomans general store or the SoF, Jagex is struggling a lot as a company right now, and to be honest they need this money to pay the devs and produce more content, such as the new drygore weapons or kalphite king.

Anyway TL;DR its basically me ranting on how you’re all whining about the EoC and want 2006 back, and to try the EoC before being a complete retard and claiming its exactly like WoW or LoL, because its not.

also if spelling mistakes sry on phone

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“OGolemX, post:70, topic:481135”]I hope they earase all the eco and then everybody is equal (no stat resets) and they just host an event every week or something to get rares into the eco… It sounds dumb, but i dont want to start way behind everyone again.
Im mad that i lost my bank (250m lololol screw you scammers!)[/quote]
Because RS is run the same as an RSPS right enough.

item.title: The return of an older-style world?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“OGolemX, post:77, topic:481135”]I lost 250m off a gambling game lol. Theres a clan called fear one at edgeville on world 131 (i think) i bet my bank because i was bored (i bet on a general rank) and i guessed hot. He planted orange and quickly picked it up and said it was a rainbow. Plus i had a vid of it. Lol.
Well gf. I actually didnt care.[/quote]

post the vid on youtube and they will give you your bank back. Then sell your cash for irl monies and donate to rsps

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell

They never said they were.

item.source: The return of an older-style world?

item.title: The return of an older-style world?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:66, topic:481135”]You guys are seriously being stupid now

The only reason classic got its own servers was because it was a fairly quick overhaul, we’re talking 7 years of progressive updates.

Note that I’m talking about backups of the ‘entire’ game in a working state. They may have bits and pieces of old code scattered around as reference but it isn’t as simple as private servers where you have one folder for the client and one folder for the server. They can’t just throw up an old revision and let you guys have fun on it.

Not really.

Not only are we talking game updates but we’re talking engine updates

backups would be a waste to store

Back to the GFX section Frell.

It’s funny how clueless you think I am

It’s not coming back. Get over it. Just because I shoot down your hopes and dreams doesn’t mean I’m ignorant.[/quote]
I wonder what you will say when it is…

Read full topic

You guys are seriously being stupid now

The only reason classic got its own servers was because it was a fairly quick overhaul, we’re talking 7 years of progressive updates.

Note that I’m talking about backups of the ‘entire’ game in a working state. They may have bits and pieces of old code scattered around as reference but it isn’t as simple as private servers where you have one folder for the client and one folder for the server. They can’t just throw up an old revision and let you guys have fun on it.
